roleset.name: cause increase in elevation
roleset.note: UPLIFT-V NOTES: Frameset created by Jena. (from uplift.01-v)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: The disaster has hit the uplifted coral.

example.name: both args
example.text: The wind uplifted some strands of gray hair not covered by his Indians cap
example.arg: some strands of gray hair not covered by his Indians cap
